tool_description: Online NoSQL database to store and retrieve your data.  You can select a region where you would like to store your data from the version list.  Storage is free, you pay only for the requests.
name: FaiRESTdb
title: FaiRESTdb

api_list.name: Create Model
api_list.description: Create a new model in a database

required_parameters.name: database
required_parameters.description: Name of your database where you want your model created

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/music/_create-model"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/{database}/_create-model"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create New Database
api_list.description: Create a new database to start storing your data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/_create-database"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Link Existing User
api_list.description: This endpoint is only for users who created their account through faiRESTdb Web Client.   Use this endpoint to link your RapidAPI account with faiRESTdb Web Client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/_web/link-my-account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Register New User
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if you don't have an account in faiRESTdb Web Client.  You can create an account with your email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/_web/register"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add Entity
api_list.description: Add new entities to your database.  Entities are grouped under it's respective models and database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/music/album"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/{database}/{model}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
